text: ARGUS, all capitalized, may refer to: * ARGUS (experiment), a particle physics experiment that ran at DESY * ARGUS distribution, a function used in particle physics named after the above experiment * Honeywell ARGUS, a low-level computer programming language * An aqueous homogeneous nuclear reactor called ARGUS at the Russian Research Centre, Kurchatov Institute * A.R.G.U.S., a fictional U.S. Government agency in DC Comics ==See also== * Argus (disambiguation) * The Argus (disambiguation)
title: ARGUS
